alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 28 at 8:57PM MDT until May 30 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 6 PM MDT MONDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected mainly above 7500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 6 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slushy road conditions at times over mountain passes, especially overnight and during periods of heaver snow. Plan on cold, wintry conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
